article.title: Indiana U.S. Export Assistance Center Contact Information
article.summary: Contact the Indiana U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
Indiana U.S. Export Assistance Center

U.S. Department of Commerce

U.S. Export Assistance Center

11405 N. Pennsylvania, Suite 106

Carmel, IN 46032


Indianapolis Staff

Mark A. Cooper, Director

Tel: (317) 582-2300

Fax: (317) 582-2301

Mark.Cooper@trade.gov


Dusan Marinkovic, Senior International Trade Specialist

Tel: (317) 582-2300

Fax: (317) 582-2301

Dusan.Marinkovic@trade.gov


Youqing Ma, Foreign Commercial Officer/Int'l Trade Specialist

Tel: (317) 582-2300

Fax: (317) 582-2301

Youqing.Ma@trade.gov

​

Leslie Britton, International Trade Specialist

Tel: (317) 582-2300

Fax: (317) 582-2301

Leslie.Britton@trade.gov
